short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An epic fantasy world where a fearsome dragon reigns over a burning, ruined city.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension brings a powerful and dark theme to your browser, with stunning visuals of an apocalyptic battle scene and the commanding presence of a dragon. Perfect for fans of fantasy, mythology, and dark atmospheres, this background will transform your browsing experience into a realm of fire and destruction.
